title: New Modern House
details:
Real Solutions for your Real Estate Needs

බ්‍රෝකර්වරැ අනවයයි

ඔබ සැබැ නිර්ව්‍යාජ ගැණුම්කරැවෙක් නම්.......

මෙම දේපළට පැමිනිමට පළමුව කරුණාකර පැහැදිලිවම කලින් දින වේලාවක් වේන්කර ගෙන පැමිනෙන්න එසේ නොමැතිව අපහසු

තාවයට පත් නොවන්න කරුණාකර දැන්විම සමිපුර්නයෙන් කියවීමෙන් පසුව අප අමතන්න.

CALLS MORN ING 7AM TO 1PM EVENING 4PM TO 8.30PM ONLY


SKYPE OPEN 24 HRS FOR OVERSEES CLIENT

MORE PROPERTIES FOR SALE PLEASE CLICK ON OUR COMPANY LOGO

SITE VISIT WITH EARLY CONFIRMATION ONLY

GENUINE BUYERS WELCOME

CALL ON GIVEN NO; OR EMAIL ………. PLEASE NO TIME WASTERS

BANK LOAN CAN ARRANGE WITHING 15 DAYS


Newly Built 2 story Architect designed Modern house at Kottawa

HOUSE UNDER CONSTRUCTION FINAL STAGE

* 5 Bedrooms 2 IN UPSTAIRS + ROOF TOP WITH 2 EXTRA ROOMS
* 3 Bathrooms & 01 Servant toilet
* Rooftop with paddy view
* Living, Dinning, Modern Pantry area
* Kitchen with pantry cupboards
* Finishing roof
* Roller gate
* Peo TV & Telephone connections
* 2600 sq. ft
* Space for 2 Vehicles
* Pipe born water with overhead water tank

* 20 ft Road
* Calm & quiet highly residential area
* 3km to Kottawa
* 2km to Pannipitiya
* 5km to southern expressway entrance
